Package ch.emf.Application_Demonstration.services

Class ServiceThymio

java.lang.Object
ch.emf.Application_Demonstration.services.ServiceThymio
All Implemented Interfaces:
IServiceThymioForController
public class ServiceThymio extends Object implements IServiceThymioForController
The ServiceThymio class manages the connection and interaction with a Thymio robot. It implements the IServiceThymioForController interface. This class handles the connection, disconnection, and various control operations for the Thymio robot.
Version:
1.0
Author:
YerlyT04

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public boolean connect(String ThymioName) throws Exception
      Connects to the Thymio robot. It sets the reference to the main controller, checks the connection status, and updates the running state.
      Specified by:
      connect in interface IServiceThymioForController
      Parameters:
      ThymioName - the name of the Thymio robot to connect to
      Returns:
      true if the connection was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the connection process

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect() throws Exception
      Disconnects from the Thymio robot. It updates the running state and sets the controller reference to null.
      Specified by:
      disconnect in interface IServiceThymioForController
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the disconnection process

    • playSound

      public boolean playSound(int frequence)
      Plays a sound on the Thymio robot.
      Specified by:
      playSound in interface IServiceThymioForController
      Parameters:
      frequence - the frequency of the sound to play
      Returns:
      true if the sound was played successfully, false otherwise

    • moveThymio

      public boolean moveThymio(int motorLeftSpeed, int motorRightSpeed)
      Moves the Thymio robot.
      Specified by:
      moveThymio in interface IServiceThymioForController
      Parameters:
      motorLeftSpeed - the speed of the left motor
      motorRightSpeed - the speed of the right motor
      Returns:
      true if the movement command was sent successfully, false otherwise

    • turnLedOn

      public boolean turnLedOn(int red, int green, int blue, String led)
      Turns on an LED on the Thymio robot.
      Specified by:
      turnLedOn in interface IServiceThymioForController
      Parameters:
      red - the red component of the LED color
      green - the green component of the LED color
      blue - the blue component of the LED color
      led - the identifier of the LED to turn on
      Returns:
      true if the LED was turned on successfully, false otherwise
